description.h2: A link:footnoteLink link:loc xlink:href attribute must start with the sharp sign "#".
description.p: Occurrences of link:footnote in an instance can only refer to facts in that instance. The target of a link:footnote locator xlink:href attribute may be an element with xsi:nil='true', so registrants should not assume that a "nil" fact is completely equivalent to a "missing" fact.

variation.name: 6.5.32 Instance footnote locator refers to own file name, NOGOOD
variation.description: Instance footnote locator refers to own file name, NOGOOD
